statements: UPDATE training_data SET rewards = 10.5, steps = 100 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE episode SET total_reward = total_reward + 50.25, start_date = '2022-09-10' WHERE episode_id = 102;
UPDATE training_data SET session_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE user_id = 101 AND training_session_id = 201;
